title: 1 Bedroom For Sale in Iris Tower at Tivoli Garden Residences, Mandaluyong City
description:
Iris Tower at Tivoli Garden Residences, Mandaluyong City

Overview of the Project
Iris Tower is one of the five residential high-rises within Tivoli Garden Residences, a premier resort-inspired community by DMCI Homes. Rising 42 stories, Iris Tower offers sweeping views of the Makati, Ortigas, and Rockwell skylines. Nestled along Coronado Street in Mandaluyong, the development provides a serene riverside address while remaining just minutes away from Makati CBD, Ortigas Center, and Bonifacio Global City.

Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Part of DMCI’s signature Lumiventt Technology, maximizing natural light and ventilation through wide atriums and sky patios.

Unit Configurations: Studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom units ranging from approx. 25 sqm to 83 sqm.

Premium Finishes: Well-planned layouts with tiled flooring, modular kitchens, and provisions for split-type air-conditioning.

Safety & Convenience: 24/7 roving security, CCTV monitoring, smart card access, high-speed elevators, and emergency power supply for common areas.

Facilities & Services
Outdoor Amenities:
Lap pool, leisure pool, and kiddie pool
Basketball court and children’s play area
Jogging paths and landscaped gardens
Sky lounge and roof deck with panoramic city views

Indoor Amenities:
Fitness gym
Function hall
Entertainment and game rooms
Lounge and lobby with concierge services
Daycare center

Services:
24-hour security and maintenance
Property management office
Ample parking spaces
Nearby Establishments

Shopping & Dining:
Power Plant Mall (Rockwell)
Century City Mall (Makati Avenue)
SM Megamall & Shangri-La Plaza (Ortigas)

Educational Institutions:
Ateneo Professional Schools – Rockwell
Mapúa University Makati
Colegio de San Agustin – Makati
University of Asia and the Pacific

Healthcare Facilities:
Makati Medical Center
Unciano General Hospital
Mandaluyong Medical Center

Business Hubs:
Makati Central Business District
Rockwell Center
Ortigas Center
Bonifacio Global City

Transportation & Accessibility
Road Access: Conveniently accessible via Makati Avenue, J.P. Rizal, and EDSA; just a few minutes to Mandaluyong Bridge and Makati-Mandaluyong Bridge for cross-city travel.

Public Transport: Near Guadalupe MRT Station; jeepney and bus routes along EDSA and J.P. Rizal for easy citywide mobility.

Shuttle & P2P Services: Nearby P2P bus terminals at Glorietta, Greenbelt, and Ortigas connect to Alabang, NAIA, and Fairview.

Airport Access: Approximately 30–40 minutes to Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) via EDSA or Skyway.

Walkability: Short drive or walk to Rockwell Center and Century City; nearby bridges connect directly to Makati’s core.


Property Specifications: 
Unit Type: 1 bedroom with 1 bathroom 
Floor area: 41sqm
Status: Fully Furnished
Parking: 0 slots

Total Contract Price: Php 3,500,000

title: 1 Bedroom For Sale In Tivoli Garden Residences, Mandaluyong City
description:
Overview of the project 
Tivoli Garden Residences is a high-rise residential condominium developed by DMCI Homes, located in Mandaluyong City—right at the heart of Metro Manila. Strategically situated near the Makati and Ortigas Central Business Districts, this expansive community offers residents the convenience of city living while surrounded by lush greenery and resort-inspired amenities.

Set along the banks of the Pasig River and easily accessible via major roads like EDSA and Boni Avenue, Tivoli Garden is ideal for professionals, families, and investors looking for a peaceful yet connected urban sanctuary. The development is only 15–20 minutes away from key business and commercial hubs.

Key Building Features
Tivoli Garden Residences is composed of multiple residential towers, each designed with DMCI’s signature Lumiventt technology for improved natural lighting and ventilation. The units range from cozy studio layouts to spacious three-bedroom homes, offering flexible options for different lifestyles.

Notable features include:

Gated community with 24-hour security
CCTV surveillance in key areas
High-speed elevators
Fire alarm and sprinkler systems
Standby backup power for common areas and select unit outlets
On-site property management office
Pet-friendly policies (subject to condo guidelines)

title: 3 Bedroom For Sale in Acqua Residences, Mandaluyong City
description:
Overview of the Project 
Acqua Private Residences is a 2.4 ha master‑planned, resort‑style riverfront condominium located along Pasig River in Coronado St., Hulo, Mandaluyong City. It connects directly to Makati via the Makati–Mandaluyong and Estrella–Pantaleon bridges, with the Makati CBD.


Key Building Features:
Architectural Design: Marketed as the Philippines’ first “residential Eden”, the design channels a rainforest aesthetic with lush plantings and water features woven throughout. A collaboration with global firm Broadway Malyan, the development features six residential towers—Niagara, Sutherland, Dettifoss, Livingstone, Iguazu, and a Hotel‑Residence (Novotel Suites) 

Unit Configurations: 
Offers 1‑ to 3‑bedroom units ranging  (28 sqm to 100 sqm) with some larger penthouses around 175 sqm. The Hotel-Residence tower features hotel‑fitted units from suites 31 sqm up to 2‑BR family suites 106 sqm.

Modern Finishes:  Acqua’s interior finishes reflect a resort-luxe aesthetic, combining internationally influenced themes, premium materials, and flexible furnishing packages. Whether you select a themed fit-out or branded suite, each tower offers a distinctive design narrative—from riveting Missoni patterns in Livingstone to Starck’s minimalism in Iguazu.


Facilities & Services
24/7 security, concierge, and gated access
 4-storey clubhouse, aptly named The Pebble, is designed like a smooth river stone overlooking the Pasig River
Movie room and function rooms
Entrance to the vibrant Riverwalk Promenade—a retail strip of cafés, bars, wellness centers, and boutiques

Amenity Deck
Lap pool, lagoon & kiddie pools with waterfall, whirlpool baths, juice bar, café, basketball & volleyball courts, locker rooms
Fitness center with TRX, weights, cardio, indoor garden
Function rooms and meeting lounges

Nearby Establishments:

Braya Tea House 
Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf

Parks and Recreation
Riverwalk Promenade – Scenic riverside strip with cafés and nightlife within the complex
The Eden- A landscaped garden across the 6th-floor podium, featuring koi ponds, water channels, and children’s play areas

Nestled beside the sprawling greens of the Wack Wack Golf and Country Club in Mandaluyong, this prestigious address offers a harmonious blend of classic elegance and modern sophistication, promising a lifestyle of unparalleled comfort and exclusivity.

𝐔𝐧𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐝 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 & 𝐕𝐢𝐞𝐰𝐬
Shang Residences Wack Wack boasts a prime location in Mandaluyong City, providing breathtaking, unobstructed views of the magnificent Wack Wack Golf Course. Enjoy serene green vistas that stretch as far as the eye can see, offering a peaceful sanctuary amidst the vibrant cityscape.

𝐀 𝐋𝐞𝐠𝐚𝐜𝐲 𝐨𝐟 𝐒𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐠 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞
As a signature project of Shang Properties, Shang Residences Wack Wack carries the legacy of luxury, quality, and meticulous attention to detail that the brand is renowned for. Experience the same unparalleled standards found in Shangri-La Hotels and Resorts, now integrated into your everyday living.

𝐄𝐱𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞𝐬 & 𝐓𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧
Shang Residences Wack Wack offers a limited collection of meticulously designed units, ensuring exclusivity and privacy for its discerning residents.

𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐭 𝐓𝐲𝐩𝐞𝐬 & 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬:
1 Bedroom Units: Ranges from approximately 80-81 sqm

2 Bedroom Units: Ranges from approximately 145 sqm

3 Bedroom Units: Ranges from approximately 169-231 sqm

Penthouse Units: Expansive and luxurious, offering the pinnacle of high-rise living.

All units are thoughtfully designed with spacious layouts, high-quality finishes, and large windows to maximize natural light and golf course views.

𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝-𝐂𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐬 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐚𝐧 𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐲𝐥𝐞
Indulge in an array of hotel-like amenities crafted for relaxation, recreation, and well-being:

Adult and Kiddie Swimming Pools: Perfect for a refreshing dip or leisurely swim.

Fully Equipped Fitness Center: State-of-the-art gym facilities for your wellness routine.

Function Rooms: Elegant spaces for private gatherings and events.

Children's Play Areas: Safe and engaging spaces for kids to enjoy.

Lounge Areas: Sophisticated common areas for relaxation and socializing.

Sauna and Steam Rooms: For ultimate rejuvenation.

Mini Putting Green: Practice your golf swing right at home.

𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲 & 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞
24/7 Security and Concierge Services: Ensuring peace of mind and personalized assistance.

Multiple High-Speed Elevators: Efficient and convenient access to all floors.

Ample Parking Spaces: Secure parking for residents and guests.

Professional Property Management: By Shang Properties, ensuring the upkeep and value of your investment.

Note: Price is for unit only + VAT

𝐒𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐠 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐬 𝐖𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐖𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐢𝐬 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝐚 𝐡𝐨𝐦𝐞; 𝐢𝐭'𝐬 𝐚 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐫𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐥𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠, 𝐚𝐧 𝐢𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐢𝐧 𝐚 𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐚𝐜𝐲.

title: For Sale: 2-Bedroom Condo Unit in The St. Francis Shangri-La Place, Mandaluyong City
Ready for Occupancy condo in Mandaluyong | Kai Garden Residences | Japanese-themed | DMCI Homes
description:
2br 53.50sqm starts at Php 27K /mo. DP

Why Choose Kai Garden Residences?

Prime Mandaluyong Location: Strategically situated along Boni Avenue, Kai Garden Residences offers unparalleled accessibility. You're just minutes away from major business districts like Ortigas Center, Makati CBD, and BGC, as well as top universities, premier hospitals, and a plethora of commercial and entertainment hubs.

Japanese-Inspired Serenity: Experience a calming ambiance with thoughtful design that brings nature indoors. From the serene gardens to the elegant architectural details, every element promotes relaxation and a harmonious living environment.

Resort-Inspired Amenities: Immerse yourself in an extensive array of leisure facilities. Enjoy refreshing dips in sprawling swimming pools (lap, kiddie, and lounge pools), unwind in lush themed gardens, stay fit at the state-of-the-art fitness gym, relax in the sky patios, or host gatherings at the clubhouse and function rooms.


Signature Lumiventt® Design Technology: Benefit from DMCI Homes' innovative design! Our Lumiventt® Technology ensures maximum natural light and refreshing airflow throughout the buildings and individual units, promoting energy efficiency and a healthier, brighter home.

Thoughtful & Efficient Unit Layouts: Choose from intelligently designed 2 bedroom units – each maximizing space and comfort. High-quality finishes and fixtures are standard, ensuring a ready-to-move-in experience (for RFO units) or a perfect canvas for your personalized dream home (for pre-selling units).

Trusted Developer: Invest with absolute confidence in DMCI Homes, a developer renowned for its unwavering commitment to superior quality, timely project delivery, and a proven legacy of building secure, well-managed, and vibrant communities for over 25 years.

Whether you are looking for:

A Ready for Occupancy (RFO) unit for immediate move-in or pay your DP in 36 months, Kai Garden Residences offers flexible payment terms and an exceptional opportunity to own a piece of Mandaluyong's most sought-after urban oasis.

Don't miss the chance to experience a truly elevated and tranquil urban lifestyle. Inquire now to schedule a personalized online presentation or an exclusive site viewing!

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale In Heliconia Tower at Tivoli Garden Residences, Mandaluyong City
description:
Heliconia Tower at Tivoli Garden Residences, Mandaluyong City

Overview of the Project

Heliconia Tower is one of the premium residential towers within Tivoli Garden Residences, a master-planned high-rise community by DMCI Homes located in Mandaluyong City. Strategically positioned along Coronado Street near the Makati-Mandaluyong Bridge, it provides convenient access to both Ortigas and Makati Central Business Districts making it an ideal choice for urban professionals and growing families. The tower rises gracefully within a resort-style environment, offering refreshing greenery and panoramic views of the Metro Manila skyline and Pasig River.



Key Building Features
Heliconia Tower exemplifies practical elegance, combining contemporary design with the reliability of DMCI Homes’ engineering and construction expertise. The tower's design supports natural ventilation and lighting, promoting a healthy and energy-efficient lifestyle.



Facilities & Services

24/7 security and roving guards
CCTV monitoring in common areas
Property management office on-site
Backup power for common areas and select outlets in units
High-speed elevators

Overview of the Project

Grand Hyatt Manila Residences South Tower is an ultra-luxury residential condominium located in Bonifacio Global City (BGC), Taguig City. Developed by Federal Land, this high-end tower is part of the Grand Hyatt complex and offers residents an exclusive hotel-inspired lifestyle. Rising above the BGC skyline, the South Tower combines elegant design, world-class amenities, and a prime location, just steps from premier shopping destinations, corporate hubs, and cultural landmarks.

Key Building Features

The South Tower reflects timeless sophistication with its refined architectural design and premium materials. Residents enjoy direct access to the Grand Hyatt Hotel’s five-star facilities, a private residential lobby, high-speed elevators, and expansive floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase panoramic views of the city. The building is designed for those who value luxury, privacy, and convenience in one prestigious address.

title: Studio For Sale In Gateway Regency, Mandaluyong City
description:
Overview of the Project

Gateway Regency is a mid to high-rise residential condominium situated in the heart of Mandaluyong City. Developed for urban dwellers seeking convenience and comfort, the project offers easy access to major commercial centers like Ortigas, Makati, and BGC. Its prime location places residents just minutes away from shopping malls, business districts, schools, and hospitals. The development features 1 to 3-bedroom units, ideal for young professionals, couples, and growing families looking for accessible city living.

Key Building Features

Gateway Regency features modern architectural design with spacious lobbies, fast elevators, and dedicated amenity areas. The building is equipped with essential urban conveniences and safety features, providing a secure and comfortable environment for its residents. It reflects a practical yet modern lifestyle with its combination of functionality and contemporary design.

Unit Configurations

Modern Finishes

title: 1 Bedroom For Sale in Light Residences, Mandaluyong City
description:
Light Residences
Overview of the Project
Light Residences is a modern residential development located in Mandaluyong City, Metro Manila, Philippines. It is designed to cater to urban dwellers who seek both convenience and comfort in the heart of the city.
Light Residences features three high-rise residential towers, each offering a range of unit types—from well-designed studio units to spacious one- and two-bedroom layouts. These units are crafted to optimize space and functionality, reflecting a contemporary aesthetic that suits the dynamic lifestyles of its residents. Whether for single professionals, starting families, or investors, the residential options are varied and flexible to meet diverse needs.It offers the comforts of home, the convenience of integrated retail and transportation, and the vibrancy of city life all in one thoughtfully planned vertical community. For those seeking a home that blends modern design with everyday practicality, Light Residences in Mandaluyong presents a compelling choice in Metro Manila’s real estate landscape.

Key Building Features
 Developed by SM Development Corporation (SMDC), one of the country’s leading real estate developers, Light Residences combines comfort, style, and strategic location to create a residential experience ideal for city dwellers seeking both connectivity and tranquility.Light Residences follows a modern minimalist approach, characterized by clean lines, geometric forms, and functional spatial planning. Each of the three towers rises above a multi-level podium that houses commercial establishments and amenities, including the SM Light Mall. This integration of retail and residential spaces is a hallmark of SMDC’s transit-oriented and mixed-use development strategy, maximizing land use efficiency and convenience for residents.
The towers are strategically spaced to allow for optimal natural ventilation and lighting, with unit layouts designed to maximize space utilization and livability. Balconies in select units offer expansive city views, while large windows provide residents with daylight access and contribute to a sense of openness and urban luxury.

Facilities & Services
24/7 security personnel
CCTV surveillance in common area
High-speed elevators
Property management services

Amenity Deck
Three swimming pools (adult and kiddie pools)
Fully equipped gym/fitness center
Children’s play area
Function rooms/events spaces
Landscaped gardens and open spaces
Jogging/walking paths
Lounge areas
Wi-Fi-ready common areas

SM Light Mall

Greenfield District restaurants and weekend market
Pioneer Centre Supermarket

Educational Institutions
Rizal Technological University – Mandaluyong

Healthcare Facilities
VRP Medical Center (just a few minutes away)
The Medical City – Ortigas
Mandaluyong City Medical Center
Unciano General Hospital
St. Luke's Medical Center – BGC (15–20 minutes via EDSA)

Parks and Recreation
Ortigas Park
Greenfield District Central Park (with food stalls and events)
Capitol Commons Park (nearby in Pasig)
Rizal Park and Ayala Triangle Gardens (accessible by MRT)
Wack Wack Golf and Country Club (short drive away)

title: 3 Bedroom For Sale in Kirov Tower, Proscenium, Makati City
description:
Kirov at The Proscenium Residences

Overview of the Project
Kirov Tower at The Proscenium in Makati City is a 56-storey luxury residential tower by Rockwell Land, designed by renowned architect Carlos Ott, offering spacious three- to four-bedroom units with elegant European-inspired interiors, world-class amenities, and low-density floor layouts for a refined and exclusive living experience.


Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Kirov Tower features a sleek, modern architectural design by world-renowned architect Carlos Ott, characterized by its towering glass façade, low-density floor layout with only 2–4 units per level, high ceilings, expansive balconies, and European-inspired interiors that reflect elegance, symmetry, and timeless sophistication.

Unit Configurations: Kirov Unit primarily composed of 3-bedroom residences ranging from approximately 224 to 241 square meters, as well as exclusive 3- and 4-bedroom penthouse units with sizes reaching up to 332 square meters each thoughtfully designed with spacious living areas, en-suite bedrooms, maid’s quarters, and private balconies for a luxurious high-rise lifestyle.

Facilities & Services
-Grand Lobby with Concierge
- Fitness Center and Gym
- Back Up Power Generators
- High Speed elevator
- 24/7 Security
- Housekeeping and maintenance support

Amenity Deck: Spanning nearly a hectare, it includes:
-Main, adult, and kiddie pools
-Grand lawn and manicured gardens
-Outdoor tennis court and jogging paths
-Cabanas and gazebos for relaxation 

Indoor Amenities:
-Fully equipped fitness center
-Function rooms for events
-Business center with meeting rooms
-Daycare centers for children .

Nearby Establishments

title: Luxury 2BR Condo for Sale in St. Francis Shangri-La Place Tower 1, Mandaluyong
description:
JP-CP
 

 Welcome to St. Francis Shangri-La Place !
 

 The St. Francis Shangri-La Place is a 60-story, twin-tower residential condominium. It is a luxury development of Shang Properties, master planned and designed by Wong Tung International Ltd. in cooperation with local architectural firm Recio + Casas Architects. Completed and opened in 2009, The St. Francis Shangri-La Place was the first building in the world to feature a damping system, the same technology used to strengthen the Millennium Bridge in London, making it one of the safest buildings in the Philippines. Offering the contemporary city dweller a beautiful and relaxing residence to come home to, every unit at The St. Francis Shangri-La Place features spacious interiors, large windows, high ceilings, and individual balconies. To further secure the convenience and fulfillment of future unit owners, the building boasts of a state-of-the-art clubhouse complete with first-class amenities and exclusive hotel services. The St. Francis Shangri-La Place is located at St. Francis St. cor. Internal Road, Brgy. Wack-Wack, Mandaluyong.

Experience luxurious 5-star urban living at One Shangri-La Place,  "Where Luxury is Standard".




Making living in the city more meaningful and less stressful is One Shangri-La Place, a mixed-use community comprised of twin towers that stand at 60 stories each. Aiming for aesthetics and function, the condominium features units that are meticulously designed with high ceilings and roomy interiors. Choose between the following sizes: studio units measuring 45 square meters; one- bedroom suites ranging from 65 to 86 square meters; two-bedroom residences that measure approximately 131 square meters; and three-bedroom suites with floor areas of around 160 square meters.




Giving future residents something to look forward to after a long day’s work, One Shangri-La Place features a six-level shopping mall with exclusive retail establishments. Because its aim is to bring life’s conveniences and all other basic necessities closer to one’s doorstep, One Shangri-La Place sits right in the center of Shangri-La Place Complex, an integrated community that houses some of Shang Properties’ most notable projects.

title: The Residences at The Westin, Mandaluyong City – 3-BR Condo For Sale
description:
CODE OP-RS




Luxury 3BR Condo for Sale in The Residences at The Westin,

Ortigas Center, Mandaluyong




Welcome to The Residences at The Westin Manila Sonata Place !




The Residences at The Westin Manila Sonata Place will rise an exclusive and private residential complex in the heart of vibrant Ortigas. It will share an iconic address with The Westin Manila Sonata Place Hotel and the existing twin-tower luxury high-rise Sonata Private Residences at the Sonata Place Complex.




Sonata Place boasts of prime location along San Miguel Avenue, which is one of the main thoroughfares of the bustling Ortigas Center business district. It is surrounded by landmark buildings and establishments, commercial centers, key institutions—hospitals and schools—as well as offices of multinational and large corporations.




Sonata Place is in an advantageous position to cater to the expanding high-end residential market in the Philippines, comprised of highly successful and discerning entrepreneurs, professionals and executives as well as the growing population of expatriates, returning overseas Filipinos and global travellers.  Owned and developed by Robinsons Land Corporation.




The Residences at The Westin Manila Sonata Place, with legal name Sonata Premier, is not owned, developed or sold by Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc., Starwood Asia Pacific Hotels & Resorts Pte. Ltd. or their affiliates. If license is terminated or expires without renewal, the project will no longer be associated with or have any right to use, the Westin®   trademarks and trade names.

3 Bedrooms

The Residences at The Westin Manila Sonata Place will rise an exclusive and private residential complex in the heart of vibrant Ortigas. description:
CP
 

 Welcome to Pioneer Highlands !
 

 For the urban professionals who want to have their own convenient and comfortable place, Pioneer Highlands might be the ideal place that you’re looking for. This high-rise twin tower residential-commercial-office condominium is located in the corner of Pioneer Street and Madison Street in Mandaluyong City wherein different modes of public transportation is readily available. For shopping and retail needs, Robinson’s Pioneer is a short walk away. It also houses Globe Telecom Plaza I and II and is nearby Robinson’s Cybergate City. Starting and growing families may also find this a favorable residence to live in as it offers various condo units for sale in Mandaluyong including one bedroom, two bedroom, and three bedroom units. A swimming pool is available for those fitness buffs or for those who just want to hang out with family or friends. For the young ones and even the young at heart, a playground is available as well.

title: 2BR Condominium for Sale in St. Francis Shangri-La
description:
Code: TL 
 

 *** FOR THE BUYERS ONLY ***
 The St. Francis Shangri-La Place ‘s 60-storey twin towers is one of the tallest residential buildings in the country. Strategically located at the heart of bustling Ortigas district known as the Shang Place, it provides residents access to an integrated community that includes the EDSA Shangri-La Hotel (with its world-class Chi Spa) and the Shangri-La Plaza Mall, with its wide range of upscale shopping choices, entertainment venues, and dinning options.
 The St. Francis Shangri-La Place redefines the standards for condominium living, with its spacious interiors featuring large windows, high ceilings and individual balconies to take advantage of Manila’s panoramic cityscape. It is also fully equipped with first class amenities and recreation choices such as wireless fidelity (WIFI) facilities, laundromat services , and 24-hour convenience store. Residents also have access to 24-hour concierge services.

title: 1-Bedroom Condo with Balcony for Sale at One Shangri-La Place, Mandaluyong
3BR Condo for Sale in One Shangri-La Place, Ortigas Center, Mandaluyong
description:
Code: TL
 

 *** For BUYERS ONLY ***
 

 

 Experience luxurious 5-star urban living at One Shangri-La Place,  "Where Luxury is Standard".
 

 Making living in the city more meaningful and less stressful is One Shangri-La Place, a mixed-use community comprised of twin towers that stand at 60 stories each. Aiming for aesthetics and function, the condominium features units that are meticulously designed with high ceilings and roomy interiors. Choose between the following sizes: studio units measuring 45 square meters; one- bedroom suites ranging from 65 to 86 square meters; two-bedroom residences that measure approximately 131 square meters; and three-bedroom suites with floor areas of around 160 square meters.
 Giving future residents something to look forward to after a long day’s work, One Shangri-La Place features a six-level shopping mall with exclusive retail establishments. Because its aim is to bring life’s conveniences and all other basic necessities closer to one’s doorstep, One Shangri-La Place sits right in the center of Shangri-La Place Complex, an integrated community that houses some of Shang Properties’ most notable projects.

title: 1 Bedroom For Sale  Forbes Wood Heights, Taguig City
description:
Fobes Wood Heights 

Forbeswood Heights stands out as a mature, mid-density residential gem in BGC with a resort‑like ambiance, robust facilities, secure environment, and strategic access to lifestyle hubs. Its architectural layout, unit finishes, and spacious outdoor amenities cater to families, young professionals, and expatriates. 




Key Building Features

Architectural Design: Forbeswood Heights is a six‑tower, mid‑rise residential condominium developed by Megaworld in Fort Bonifacio, Taguig (BGC), completed in 2007 . Each tower rises 22 stories with 12 units per floor, offering studio to three‑bedroom options and low‑density living




Unit Configurations: Offers studio, 1-bedroom, 2- bedroom and 3-bedroom units ranging from (36.5-155 sqm) ,designed to provide space efficiency, comfort, and practicality, making it suitable for singles, couples, and small to large families.




Premium Finishes: Includes polished ceramic tile flooring in living and dining areas, and wood parquet flooring in the bedrooms for warmth and elegance. Kitchens come equipped with modular cabinets and stainless steel sinks, while bathrooms feature fully tiled walls and floors with modern fixtures and mechanical ventilation for better airflow. The use of these finishes ensures a balance of functionality and aesthetic appeal, making the units both practical and visually pleasing.




Safety and Convenience: Equipped with 24/7 security personnel, CCTV surveillance, and controlled access points to ensure a secure environment. Fire safety systems such as automatic sprinklers and smoke detectors are installed throughout the property. Its prime location in BGC provides residents with quick access to business districts, schools, healthcare facilities, and retail centers, making daily life seamless and efficient.




Facilities & Services

-24/7 Security and Surveillance: CCTV monitoring and controlled access points

-Swimming Pool Complex: Includes a lap pool for serious swimmers and a free-form pool with an in-water lounge for relaxation. 

- Fitness Center: Fully equipped fitness that caters residents and who want to maintain an active and healthy lifestyle without leaving the property

- Children’s Playground: Featuring slides and other play structures to provide a fun and secure environment for children to play and socialize.




Amenity Deck:

-Landscaped Gardens

-Function rooms for events and gatherings

-Pet-friendly policy allowing furry companions




Nearby Establishments

Shopping & Dining:

-Uptown Mall: A modern lifestyle mall featuring over 150 stores, including high-end fashion brands, a cinema with reclining seats, and a rooftop chapel.

-Robinsons Selections – A supermarket offering a wide range of products.

-Big Bad Wolf (BBW): A popular brunch spot known for its hearty meals.

-Dr. Wine BGC – A wine bar offering a selection of wines and tapas.




Educational Institutions:

-Kelly Academy International 

-Little Gym




Healthcare Facilities:

-St. Luke’s Medical Center Global City

-.Le Clinique 




Recreation and Leisure

-Forbestown Center – A commercial area with dining and retail options.

-The Mind Museum – A science museum offering interactive exhibits.

Unit Type: 1 bedroom unit

Floor area: 36.5 sqm

Status: Full-Furnished

Parking: 0 slots

Total Contract Price: Php 35,000

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale Cityland Calle Estacion, Makati City
description:
The Cityland Calle Estacion

Cityland Calle Estacion offers an affordable and strategically located living option in Makati. With its proximity to essential establishments and public transportation, it caters to individuals and families seeking convenience without the high cost associated with other Makati properties. While there are some considerations regarding maintenance, the overall value proposition makes it a viable choice for budget-conscious residents.




Key Building Features

Architectural Design: features a post‑modern architectural style, typical of mid‑2000s urban residential high‑rises in Makati




Unit Configurations: Offers studio, 1-bedroom, and 2-bedroom units ranging from (25-72 sqm) , designed for space efficiency, comfort, and practicality, catering to singles, couples, and small families.




Premium Finishes: Includes porcelain or engineered wood flooring, granite or quartz kitchen countertops, modern cabinetry, ceramic-tiled bathrooms with elegant fixtures, large aluminum-framed windows, and contemporary lighting—all contributing to a stylish yet durable living space.




Safety and Convenience: Provides a secure and convenient living environment ideal for city dwellers. Its safety is ensured through 24-hour security personnel, CCTV surveillance, and controlled access points.




Facilities & Services

Facilities cater to various lifestyles, promoting relaxation, fitness, and social interaction




Amenity Deck: Spanning nearly a hectare, it includes:

-Main, adult, and kiddie pools

-Spa and Sauna 

-Fitness Center

- Roof Garden with a viewing deck

-Jogging Paths







Indoor Amenities:

-Fully equipped fitness center

Nearby Establishments

title: Pre selling projects a Shaw Blvd Mandaluyong near Shangri-la
description:
Inspired by the concept of a crosswalk—a marked path that allows people to safely traverse streets and reach their destinations—Vista Land, the Philippines’ leading integrated property developer, redefines the term through an innovative development symbolizing the journey toward achieving goals and aspirations. Offering a secure and supportive setting where residents can pursue their ambitions, its initial offering, Crosswalk Tower, will be built to make pathways for people to confidently advance in their personal and professional lives.




About 30 minutes from central business districts in Cubao, Ortigas Center, Makati, and Bonifacio Global City (BGC), the 46-storey high-rise development will be served by a road network greater than any city in the National Capital Region. Its proximity to retail destinations such as Shangri-La Plaza, Estancia Mall, and Powerplant Mall ensures residents a world of entertainment and retail experiences right at their doorstep.




Crosswalk Tower offers a range of options from cozy studios to spacious three-bedroom condominium, to accommodate every lifestyle and preference. The low-density unit spread has been carefully planned to suit the residents' diverse needs, ensuring that every detail of the living space is stylish and practical. Going beyond the draw of its geography, Crosswalk offers amenities like a gym, cinema suite, infinity pool with a Jacuzzi, and roof deck.

Crosswalk Tower is more than just its definition of a specially paved or marked path; it embodies a symbol of choice and progress, inviting residents to make decisions and walk confidently toward their aspirations.




Strategically located within central business districts, transportation hubs, and educational clusters in Metro Manila and key cities, the company envisions creating condominiums Filipinos can truly be at home. The vertical communities offer investment opportunities, as real estate often appreciates in value, or leased to generate passive income.

title: Ready to Move in Condo located at Shaw Blvd Mandaluyong pay 3% DP to Move in
description:
Vista Shaw | Condo in Shaw Blvd
Vista Shaw by Vista Residences is one of the most ideal condominiums to live in Mandaluyong. It is a 38-storey condominium that rises over Shaw Blvd, at the corner of Laurel Street, where the former Laurel Mansion, home to President Jose P. Laurel and his family for generations, still stands.

This condo for sale in Mandaluyong offers endless possibilities, such as living in the shopping capital in Metro Manila with malls, restaurants, and other commercial centers nearby, such as Shangri La Plaza, SM Megamall, Podium, Robinsons Galleria. Various transport hubs available to the residents of Vista Shaw make you closer to major offices and business districts. Moreover, Vista Shaw is also close to schools such as Poveda, La Salle Greenhills, Lourdes School of Mandaluyong, Asian Institute of Management, and St. Paul. Vista Shaw is also close to major thoroughfares of EDSA, Ortigas Avenue, and Shaw Blvd. It is also within reach of various modes of transportation such as buses, jeepneys, and MRT. This is to provide the best experience to the Filipinos and other international investors.

The Perfect Condo Near Shaw Boulevard
Mandaluyong has a reputation for being a comfortable and centrally located suburb. It is home to many notable businesses such as the SM Megamall, The Podium, and EDSA Shangri-La. If convenience matters foremost, a unit in Vista Shaw is a good choice for people who work in the CBD or around Ortigas. The condo near Ortigas Center is a high-end option in terms of excellent investments. Vista Shaw is close to Shangri La Place and St. Francis Shangri-La Place. The property's location is close to the Central Business District of Makati (CBD).

Wifi-ready on most common areas

title: 1 BR CONDO FOR SALE @ ACQUA PRIVATE RESIDENCES IN MANDALUYONG FOR ONLY P4.5M
description:
Description:

Discover your ideal urban retreat with this 1-bedroom condo unit for sale at the prestigious Acqua Private Residences in Mandaluyong City. Situated on the 18th floor of the Livingstone Tower, this 27 sqm unit features a well-planned layout that includes 1 bedroom, 1 toilet and bath, and a private balcony — perfect for enjoying the city skyline.

Ideal for young professionals, couples, or investors, this unit offers a stylish and comfortable living space in a prime location. Aqua Private Residences is a master-planned development known for its resort-like amenities and unique design.

Key Features:


  1 bedroom with ample natural light

  1 toilet and bath

  Private balcony

  27 sqm floor area

  Located on the 18th floor of Livingstone Tower


Amenities:


  Swimming pools

  Fully equipped fitness center

  Lounge areas and function rooms

  Jogging paths and landscaped gardens

  24/7 security and concierge services


Nearby Establishments:


  Rockwell Power Plant Mall

  Makati CBD via Estrella-Pantaleon Bridge

  Century City Mall

  Schools such as Ateneo Professional Schools and Mapua University

  Easy access to public transport, restaurants, banks, and more


Whether you’re looking for your next home or an investment in a sought-after location, this unit at Aqua Private Residences offers great value at only PHP 4.5M. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to own a piece of premium city living in the heart of Mandaluyong.

title: 1BR CONDO; ST FRANCIS SHANGRI-LA PLACE - MANDALUYONG CITY - FOR SALE
Prime 1BR Condo for Sale in One Shang Place, Mandaluyong – Fully Furnished
description:
Prime 1BR Condo for Sale in One Shang Place, Mandaluyong – Fully Furnished







Step into luxury with this fully-furnished 1-bedroom condo at One Shang Place, Mandaluyong’s premier address. Designed by world-class architects, this elegant 65 sqm unit offers modern living with top-notch finishes, a spacious parking slot, and stunning city views from the 18th floor.




Property Code: DS88-004246

Project / Tower: ONE SHANG PLACE

Location: North Tower, 18th Floor

Size: FA: 65 SQ.M

Type: CONDOMINIUM

Developer: Shang Properties, Inc.

Other details:

- 1 Bedroom

- 1 Toilet & Bath

- Fully furnished

- 1 Parking Slot

***Assoc dues with parking: ₱8,450/month

***Turnover: 2016 | CCT: 2018

Title Status: Clean Title

Occupancy: Owner Lived







Sale price: Php 22,000,000.00 (Gross)

Payment terms: Cash & bank financing







One Shangri-La Place is a landmark twin-tower condominium development situated in Shang Central along Epifanio delos Santos Avenue, Ortigas Center, Mandaluyong City. Rising to 227 meters (745 feet) with 64 floors, these towers rank among the tallest twin residential buildings in the Philippines. Completed in 2014 and 2015 for the low and high zones respectively, One Shangri-La Place offers luxurious urban living with direct access to Shangri-La Plaza Mall, providing residents with convenient access to upscale shopping, dining, and entertainment options.




Indoor Amenities:

- Deluxe banquet/function rooms; Fully equipped gym and exercise room; Male and female changing rooms with sauna and steam rooms; Hot and cold plunge pools; Spacious indoor and outdoor children’s play areas and party rooms; Game room and billiards room

Multi-purpose room; Mini-theatre; 24-hour concierge service; 14 high-speed passenger and service elevators (split into high and low zones)




Outdoor Amenities:

- Adult and kiddie swimming pools; Barbecue/outdoor dining area; Outdoor basketball half-court; Outdoor lawn and seating areas; Car park for residents and guests










For inquiries & viewings, contact:




Andre Lotuaco 

AAA Realty

Managing Partner

title: 2BR for Sale Shang Residences Wack Wack - Mandaluyong
description:
2BR for Sale Shang Residences Wack Wack - Mandaluyong







Live in one of Mandaluyong’s most prestigious addresses! This 2BR unit at Shang Residences Wack Wack offers golf course views, a maid’s room, balcony, and semi-furnished comfort in 142 SQ.M of space.




Property Code: FS928

Project / Tower: SHANG RESIDENCES WACK WACK

Location: 575 Wack Wack Road, Mandaluyong City

Size: 142.01 SQ.M

Type: CONDOMINIUM

Developer: Shang Properties, Inc.

Other details:  

- Brand new unit

- 2 Bedrooms

- 2 Toilet & Bath

- Maid's room with own T&B

- With balcony 

- View of Wack Wack Golf Course

- Semi furnished




Sale price: Php 46,348,000.00







***

Shang Residences at Wack Wack is an exclusive, resort-style residential tower nestled in the lush, serene neighborhood of Wack Wack, Mandaluyong. Surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens and located beside the prestigious Wack Wack Golf & Country Club, it offers some of the most coveted views in the city—either overlooking two 18-hole championship golf courses or the stunning Makati skyline.




Features & Amenities:

- Grand Lobby with an exclusive entrance and driveway

- Adult and children’s swimming pools with lounge areas

- Fully-equipped gym

- Function rooms for social events

- Children’s indoor and outdoor play zones

- Mini theater

- Steam and sauna rooms

- Billiard room

- Multipurpose/exercise room

- Male and female locker rooms

- Mail room

- Intercom system with direct link to the lobby receptionist

title: Studio Condo Unit For Sale in Mandaluyong Boni EDSA
description:
Pioneer Woodlands a Highly-Accessible and Commuter-Friendly Condominium in Mandaluyong City. Pioneer Woodlands experience sheer accessibility and convenience at Pioneer Woodlands, your six-tower, high-rise community along EDSA corner Pioneer St. in Mandaluyong City. With a superb location that prides itself in its direct link to Boni station of MRT-3, and its highly strategic address right in the middle of EDSA, you can truly experience what it feels like to be at the forefront of your city-living needs. To those who want to experience leisure and full accessibility, Pioneer Woodlands by Empire East is the answer. It is a high-rise condominium located at EDSA corner Pioneer Street, Mandaluyong City. Through an outstanding location that takes pride in its direct connection to the Boni station of MRT Line 3, anyone can experience urban living at its finest. This condominium complex is envisioned to have six towers, offering residents with thousands of units to occupy.

title: Claim This Modern 3BR Loft Penthouse Before Its Gone!
description:
Beautifully renovated 3-bedroom penthouse loft, located on the 32nd floor of Gateway Garden Heights, ideally positioned in the center of the metropolis. From this vantage point, you’ll enjoy expansive views and a wealth of natural light flooding the space, thanks to two wide windows that create a bright, airy ambiance.

This home is not only stylish but also highly functional, with a layout that blends modern aesthetics with everyday practicality. From the well-thought-out storage solutions to the flood of natural light, this unit is designed for those who value both form and function.

About Gateway Garden Heights

Gateway Garden Heights is a residential condominium within the Robinsons Pioneer Complex in Mandaluyong City, located at the heart of the metropolis. Its prime location near EDSA puts you at the center of the region’s travel routes, with easy access to both the South to North and East to West travel corridors, making it ideal for those who value connectivity and convenience.

Enjoy a healthy, well-connected, and welcoming community with wide open spaces, cozy interiors, and a suite of family-friendly amenities including:

Swimming pools
Gym
Garden and children's play area
Karaoke and billiard rooms
Wi-Fi lounge
Roofdeck function area
24/7 security and guest parking
Unit Features:

Intercom per unit connecting to Security/Reception

Cable TV and telephone line provisions
Automatic heat/smoke detectors and sprinkler system
With only 15 units across 32 floors, exclusivity and comfort are guaranteed.

Don’t miss this rare gem—sun-filled, modern, and move-in ready.

title: 1-Bedroom Corner Unit at AVIDA TOWERS CENTERA TOWER 1
description:
This resale 1-bedroom corner unit is at the 16th floor of Avida Towers Centera - Tower 1, an Ayala Land development strategically positioned right along EDSA, near Boni MRT Station, making it super accessible to Ortigas, BGC, and Makati — a huge plus for both end-users and investors.


Avida Towers Centera is a modern, four-tower residential project by Avida Land, rising along EDSA in Mandaluyong City — placing you right in the middle of Metro Manila’s business, transport, and lifestyle hubs.


Why is this a smart move for OFWs and young professionals?

✅ Prime, Connected Location: Along EDSA, near MRT stations and business districts like Ortigas, BGC, and Makati — whether you’re settling down, working nearby, or renting it out, you’re in the middle of everything.

✅ Trusted Ayala Legacy: Avida Land, part of Ayala Land, ensures your investment is in safe, credible, and future-proof hands.

✅ Ready Market & High Demand: Young professionals and renters are always on the lookout for accessible, modern homes in central Manila — giving you excellent rental income potential.

✅ Modern Comfort, Complete Amenities: Swimming pools, gyms, function rooms, retail shops, and landscaped open spaces — perfect for balancing city hustle with downtime.

✅ Excellent City Home: It’s more than an address — it’s a peaceful, secure, and well-planned community in the heart of the city. After a long day, come home to a modern space where you can recharge, unwind, and enjoy life without leaving the metro.

✅ Strong Appreciation Potential: Mandaluyong is fast-rising, and properties here consistently increase in value, making your purchase both a home and a future asset.




Bottom line: Whether you’re an OFW investing for your future home, or a young pro seeking a smart, stylish city address — Avida Towers Centera lets you live where it matters and grow your investment where it counts.


Come and check out this unit! Message the broker for more.

title: 30k monthly RENT TO OWN READY FOR OCCUPANCY Executive Studio in Pioneer Woodlands in Mandaluyong near THE MEDICAL CITY, ORTIGAS, SM MEGA MALL
description:
Pioneer Woodlands is a six-tower, high-rise residential community strategically located at the corner of EDSA and Pioneer Street in Mandaluyong City, Metro Manila. This prime location offers residents unparalleled accessibility, being directly connected to the Boni Avenue Station of the MRT-3 railway system.   

Location and Accessibility

Situated along EDSA, Pioneer Woodlands provides seamless connectivity to major business districts:
	•	Ortigas Central Business District (1.75 km) 
       •	Makati Central Business District (3.20 km) 
       •	Bonifacio Global City (3.53 km) 

The direct link to Boni MRT Station allows residents to traverse Metro Manila with ease, connecting them to key areas from North Avenue to Taft Avenue.  

Amenities and Facilities

Pioneer Woodlands offers a range of amenities designed for comfort and leisure:
	•	Recreational Facilities:
	•	Lap swimming pool 
	•	Wading pool 
	•	Paved sunbathing deck 
	•	Children’s playground 
	•	Fitness gym 
	•	Outdoor fitness station 
	•	Jogging paths 
	•	Function room 
	•	Building Features:
	•	Interior-designed lobby and common areas 
	•	Mailroom 
	•	24-hour security and maintenance services 
	•	Fire alarm and smoke detection systems 
	•	Two fire exits per tower 
	•	Centralized sanitary disposal system 
	•	Automatic fire sprinkler system 
	•	Overhead water tank and underground cistern for ample water supply 
	•	Standby power generator for selected common areas 
	•	Building administration and security office 

Proximity to Essential Establishments

Residents benefit from close proximity to various establishments:
	•	Shopping Centers:
	•	Forum Robinsons (0.18 km) 
	•	SM Megamall (1.8 km) 
	•	Shangri-La Plaza (1.4 km) 
	•	Educational Institutions:
	•	Lourdes School of Mandaluyong (1.27 km) 
	•	University of Asia & the Pacific (1.5 km) 
	•	St. Pedro Poveda School (2.23 km) 
	•	Healthcare Facilities:
	•	Victor R. Potenciano Medical Center (0.51 km) 
	•	The Medical City (2.94 km) 

Pioneer Woodlands combines strategic location, comprehensive amenities, and excellent accessibility, making it an ideal residence for those seeking a dynamic urban lifestyle in Metro Manila.

Unit is in Pioneer Woodlands, Edsa cor Pioneer st Mandaluyong City

Experience sheer accessibility and convenience at Pioneer Woodlands, your six-tower, high-rise community along EDSA corner Pioneer St. in Mandaluyong City. 1's podium

The Residences at The Westin Manila Sonata Place is the first Westin-branded Residences in Southeast Asia to make its mark within the luxurious Sonata Place complex located in the heart of Ortigas Center Business District. Soon to rise beside The Westin Manila Sonata Place Hotel and Sonata Private Residences, residents will get easy access to a world of privileges.

Come home to lavish private residences where you can enjoy Westin signature amenities like the Westin Heavenly® Bed that lets you wake up well and recharged after a good night's sleep. Indulge in delicious and nutrient-rich SuperFoodsRX™ entrees, made available upon request. Calm your senses with the Heavenly® Bath shower experience. Take your workout to the next level with the services of a RunWESTIN™ concierge.

The Residences at The Westin Manila Sonata Place takes pride in curating every detail of each suite, so that each room's finishes and fixtures speak of luxury, with your well-being in mind.

 

In the heart of vibrant Ortigas, next to The Westin Manila Sonata Place hotel, in a prime location along San Miguel Avenue. The business district is home to landmark buildings and establishments, commercial centers and key institutions.

STARWOOD PREFERRED GUESTÃ‚Â® GOLD CARD
The homeowners of The Residences at The Westin Manila are entitled to receive the Starwood Preferred GuestÂ® Gold Card, valid for five (5) years. Unlock a world of possibilities as you get to enjoy special benefits on distinctive hotel brands under Marriott International â€” including St. RegisÂ®, The Ritzâ€‘CarltonÂ® and WestinÂ®. The Starwood Preferred GuestÂ® Gold Card can be linked with Marriott Rewards or The Ritzâ€‘Carlton RewardsÂ®.

title: Ready for Occupancy Studio Unit in Boni Mandaluyong Only 10% DP to Move in
description:
Ready for Occupancy - walking distance to Boni Edsa
10% Downpayment to Move in

Axis Residences by RLC Residences 
Ready for Occupancy 
Investment starts at 4.8M (24SQM)
Reservation fee of 50K only

In Axis Residences, you can be at the center of the metro, where the rest of the city revolves around you. This two-tower development is located within the vibrant Robinsons Forum in Pioneer, Mandaluyong City, one of the fastest developing urban hubs in Metro Manila.

This landmark project of the country's two most trusted property developers, Robinsons Land Corporation and Federal Land, Inc., will set new standards when it comes to mobility and convenience. The residential condominium development combines the benefits of living within an exceptionally well-planned, mixed-use residential complex with the peace of mind that only a truly smart investment can offer.

Be able to enjoy the convenience of having your very own city address right at the center of the metro's commercial, leisure, and business districts with Axis Residences.

Axis Residences provides unit owners an unparalleled edge in mobility and accessibility through its strategic central location. This haven within the quiet side of EDSA is located within the Robinsons Forum in Pioneer, Mandaluyong. Aside from its convenient proximity to the MRT station, Axis Residences is also near other major thoroughfares including C5 and EDSA.

Say goodbye to the hassles of daily traffic and say hello to the perks of living within reach of the best that the metro has to offer. Because it is strategically located between Makati, Manila, and Quezon City, unit owners are conveniently located near financial and commercial hubs such as Makati, Ortigas, and Bonifacio Global City CBDs.

Axis Residences is a two-phase multi-tower condominium development in Pioneer Street Mandaluyong City. The first phase features two-tower residences on a 12,599 sq.m. lot.

Amenities
 

Unit owners in Axis Residences can enjoy the many perks of condo living with the myriad of amenities and leisure facilities, which make for an inspired city living experience.


- Adult Lap Pool with pool deck
- Kiddie Pool
- Function Rooms
- Fitness Center
- Children’s Playground
- Multipurpose Covered Court
- Pavilion
- Landscaped Garden
- Game Room

Security and convenience are also ensured to the residents through the services of the Property Management Office (PMO). The teams offers the following services:

- General maintenance of common areas
- Move-in assistance
- Roving security personnel for common areas

*Acqua Private Residences is located in Mandaluyong, a strategic area in Metro Manila that provides easy access to major business districts like Makati, Ortigas, and BGC. It's right at the intersection of key thoroughfares such as EDSA and Shaw Boulevard, ensuring that residents can easily commute to work, schools, and other important areas.

* The property’s location in a central business and residential district, combined with the growing demand for residential spaces in Metro Manila, makes it ideal for rental income. Professionals working in nearby offices in Makati, Ortigas, and BGC are often seeking properties in Mandaluyong for its accessibility.

*Acqua Private Residences offers a unique lifestyle with its wide range of high-end amenities. The development features a man-made beach, a swimming pool, a fitness center, and various recreational areas, providing a resort-like experience in the middle of the city.

*Acqua Private Residences in Mandaluyong presents a strong investment opportunity due to its strategic location, high-end amenities, world-class developer, and growing demand in the area. Whether you're looking for a premium residence or an investment property with the potential for rental income and capital appreciation, Acqua Private Residences stands out as a wise choice.

title: 2 Bedroom at Acqua Private Residences, Mandaluyong
description: A thematic development right across Rockwell, with clear view of the Makati Skyline. It is directly accessible via Estrella-Pantaleon Bridge, providing convenient access to Bel-Air, Poblacion and Salcedo Village in Makati. The community boasts of an impressive amenities complex with indoor and outdoor pools, commercial grade gym and fitness center, private theater, rubberized basketball court, commercial arcade, and interweaving tropical landscape at the podium. This particular property is a mid-level, 2-bedroom unit with maid's room (separate toilet and bath), that has an unobstructed view of the Pasig River and Rockwell Center. Total package comes fully-furnished with 1 parking slot.

title: Brand New Two-Bedroom Unit for Sale in Vista Shaw by Vista Residences, Mandaluyo
description:
Brand New Two-Bedroom Unit for Sale in Vista Shaw by Vista Residences, Mandaluyong




Ref No.: BCRC409

Floor: 21st

Floor Area: 50.40 sqm

BARE

Bedroom: 2

Bathroom: 1

- Corner Unit

- Ready for Occupancy

- Facing Wack Wack Golf Course




Selling Price: P7,000,000.00




Vista Shaw by Vista Residences is one of the most ideal condominiums to live in Mandaluyong. It is a 38-storey condominium that rises over Shaw Blvd, at the corner of Laurel Street, where the former Laurel Mansion, home to President Jose P. Laurel and his family for generations, still stands.

This condo for sale in Mandaluyong offers endless possibilities, such as living in the shopping capital in Metro Manila with malls, restaurants, and other commercial centers nearby, such as Shangri La Plaza, SM Megamall, Podium, Robinsons Galleria. Various transport hubs available to the residents of Vista Shaw make you closer to major offices and business districts. Moreover, Vista Shaw is also close to schools such as Poveda, La Salle Greenhills, Lourdes School of Mandaluyong, Asian Institute of Management, and St. Paul. Vista Shaw is also close to major thoroughfares of EDSA, Ortigas Avenue, and Shaw Blvd. It is also within reach of various modes of transportation such as buses, jeepneys, and MRT. This is to provide the best experience to the Filipinos and other international investors.

title: 26k per month | 1 Bedroom with Balcony | Avida Towers Verge | FOR SALE
description:
Avida Towers Verge – Prime Living in Mandaluyong City

Overview

Avida Towers Verge is a modern, thoughtfully designed residential condominium strategically located along Reliance Street, Mandaluyong City. This prime development by Avida Land (an Ayala Land Company) offers the perfect blend of accessibility, comfort, and convenience, catering to young professionals, families, and investors looking for a vibrant yet balanced urban lifestyle.

Key Features and Highlights
Location:
	•	Address: Reliance Street cor. Mayflower St. Brgy. Highway Hills, Mandaluyong City.
	•	Proximity: Located in the heart of Metro Manila, Avida Towers Verge connects you to key business districts, entertainment hubs, and lifestyle destinations:
	•	10 minutes to Ortigas CBD
        •      12 minutes to BGC CBD
	•	15 minutes to Makati CBD
	•	Easy access to EDSA, MRT Stations (Boni and Shaw), and public transportation.
Development Details:
	•	Developer: Avida Land Corporation
	•	Completion Date: Varies by tower (Tower 1-2023; Tower 2-2026).
	•	Total Towers: 3 high-rise towers with modern architectural design.
	•	Unit Types:
	•	Junior 1 Bedroom (23.4sqm)
	•	1 Bedroom (38.4 sqm)
	•	Floor Levels: High-rise, offering stunning views of the city skyline.
Amenities:
Avida Towers Verge features resort-like amenities for relaxation, recreation, and productivity:
	•	Adult and kiddie swimming pools
	•	Outdoor gym and fitness area
	•	Children’s play area
	•	Clubhouse and function rooms
	•	Landscaped gardens and open spaces
	•	Jogging paths and walking trails
	•	24/7 security with CCTV monitoring
	4.	Green and Sustainable Living:
	•	Efficient building design to maximize natural light and ventilation.
	•	Water and energy-saving features incorporated into the property.
	•	Waste management system for an eco-friendly environment.

Reasons to Choose Avida Towers Verge
	•	Accessibility: Be at the center of Metro Manila’s dynamic districts and enjoy hassle-free commuting with nearby transport hubs and major roads.
	•	Lifestyle Options: Surrounded by shopping malls (SM Megamall, Robinsons Galleria, Greenfield District), hospitals, schools, and recreational venues.
	•	Ayala Brand Assurance: With Avida Land, expect top-quality construction, reliable customer service, and lasting property value.
	•	Investment Opportunity: With its central location and premium features, Avida Towers Verge is ideal for both end-users and property investors.

Pricing and Payment Options
Price Range:
	• 1 Bedroom with Balcony
                  TCP: ₱ 11, 203, 800.00
                  10% Spot Downpayment: ₱  P 1, 057, 671 .45 
                  10% Stretched in 42mos: ₱ 26, 373 .13
                  80% Bank Financing: 8, 861, 371. 60
(Prices may vary depending on unit size, floor level, and availability)

Flexible Payment Terms:
	•	Spot Cash
	•	Deferred Payment
	•	Bank Financing Options Available

For inquiries, site visits, or unit reservations, please contact me. I am happy and please to assist you.
Experience the best of city living at Avida Towers Verge. Schedule a visit today and Reserve the unit for AS LOW AS ₱ 50, 000 only!

BIDDING GUIDELINES
1. Sale is on an “AS IS-WHERE IS” basis.

2. Bidders should make reasonable examination of property title/s and tax declaration/s and inspection of the physical condition and location of the properties. It is best to contact the specific Sales Advisors indicated on the properties listed for further queries.

3. Buyers should make a bid through the online submission platform as indicated on from November 04, 2024, at 9:00:00AM to November 26, 2024, at 9:00:00AM. The official time indicated on the online registry will serve as our official time of receipt of the bids.

4. The Bank shall not accept bids beyond the defined cut-off date and time.

5. The Seller reserves the right to withdraw the Property/ies at any time before the deadline for submission of bids.

6. The Seller reserves the right to reject any and all offers at its sole discretion, waive any defects or informality on the offers received and accepts the most advantageous to the Seller but does not guarantee that any award shall be made.

-----

It is expected from buyers to conduct due diligence including actual physical inspection of the property prior to submitting a bid.

Property Classification: Green Tag (in possession, with complete property documents)

title: 1 Bedroom Junior Condo Unit for Sale in Mandaluyong | Avida Towers Verge
description:
Avida Towers Verge – Prime Living in Mandaluyong City

Overview

Avida Towers Verge is a modern, thoughtfully designed residential condominium strategically located along Reliance Street, Mandaluyong City. This prime development by Avida Land (an Ayala Land Company) offers the perfect blend of accessibility, comfort, and convenience, catering to young professionals, families, and investors looking for a vibrant yet balanced urban lifestyle.

Key Features and Highlights
Location:
	•	Address: Reliance Street cor. Mayflower St. Brgy. Highway Hills, Mandaluyong City.
	•	Proximity: Located in the heart of Metro Manila, Avida Towers Verge connects you to key business districts, entertainment hubs, and lifestyle destinations:
	•	10 minutes to Ortigas CBD
        •      12 minutes to BGC CBD
	•	15 minutes to Makati CBD
	•	Easy access to EDSA, MRT Stations (Boni and Shaw), and public transportation.
Development Details:
	•	Developer: Avida Land Corporation
	•	Completion Date: Varies by tower (Tower 1-2023; Tower 2-2026).
	•	Total Towers: 3 high-rise towers with modern architectural design.
	•	Unit Types:
	•	Junior 1 Bedroom (23.4sqm)
	•	1 Bedroom (38.4 sqm)
	•	Floor Levels: High-rise, offering stunning views of the city skyline.
Amenities:
Avida Towers Verge features resort-like amenities for relaxation, recreation, and productivity:
	•	Adult and kiddie swimming pools
	•	Outdoor gym and fitness area
	•	Children’s play area
	•	Clubhouse and function rooms
	•	Landscaped gardens and open spaces
	•	Jogging paths and walking trails
	•	24/7 security with CCTV monitoring
	4.	Green and Sustainable Living:
	•	Efficient building design to maximize natural light and ventilation.
	•	Water and energy-saving features incorporated into the property.
	•	Waste management system for an eco-friendly environment.

Reasons to Choose Avida Towers Verge
	•	Accessibility: Be at the center of Metro Manila’s dynamic districts and enjoy hassle-free commuting with nearby transport hubs and major roads.
	•	Lifestyle Options: Surrounded by shopping malls (SM Megamall, Robinsons Galleria, Greenfield District), hospitals, schools, and recreational venues.
	•	Ayala Brand Assurance: With Avida Land, expect top-quality construction, reliable customer service, and lasting property value.
	•	Investment Opportunity: With its central location and premium features, Avida Towers Verge is ideal for both end-users and property investors.

Pricing and Payment Options
Price Range:
	• Junior 1 Bedroom-
                  TCP: ₱ 6, 372, 000
                  10% Spot Downpayment: ₱ 585, 363.00
                  10% Stretched in 42mos: ₱ 15, 127.69
                  80% Bank Financing: 5, 082, 903.09
(Prices may vary depending on unit size, floor level, and availability)

Flexible Payment Terms:
	•	Spot Cash
	•	Deferred Payment
	•	Bank Financing Options Available

For inquiries, site visits, or unit reservations, please contact me. I am happy and please to assist you.
Experience the best of city living at Avida Towers Verge. Schedule a visit today and Reserve the unit for AS LOW AS ₱ 50, 000 only!

FOR SALE 1BR CONDO UNIT & PARKING- THE RESIDENCES AT THE WESTIN MANILA SONATA PLACE
description:
COME HOME TO A WESTIN.

Experience the luxury of living well at The Residences at the Westin Manila Sonata Place

What's better than a Shang or a Rockwell Condo?

- Place combines WELLNESS with LUXURY making this an AWARD-WINNING residential development.

-A perfect home in the heart of Ortigas Central Business District.

- HASSLE-FREE INVESTMENT at WESTIN MANILA

Top 5 Reasons to Invest:

• A home that’s close to key destinations in the Metro

• Perfect for the family looking for comfort, security and relaxation

• Top-notch amenities within the development

• Assured increase in property values

• Best for Rental Investment, Vacation Home and Retirement Home

What WESTIN has to Offer?

Every unit and amenities are engineered to ensure comfort and well-being.


Hotel Services extended to every residential units

Enjoy HOTEL SERVICES at the comfort of your own HOME!

PREMIUM DELIVERABLES

*Gaggenau and Leicht - for a 5-star cooking at home experience

*Duravit and Hansgrohe - for a 5-star daily bathroom experience

*The Heavenly Bed - comes with every unit, have a peaceful slumber with Westin's TRADEMARK bed

*The Westin's Heavenly Bath - Large shower droplets for a delicate and refreshing shower experience

The Residences at the Westin Manila Sonata Place is a high-rise residential of concrete glass and steel, boasts of a myriad of building amenities and features for the family looking to upgrade their current living spaces.

The Residences at the Westin Manila Sonata Place prime location in Mandaluyong City, assures unparalleled access to hospital and educational institutions and commercial centers, thus providing utmost convenience for you and your family.

Leading commercial establishments such as SM Megamall, Podium, Shangri-La Mall and Robinsons Gallery. It is accessible as well to top notch schools in the country - Lasalle Greenhills, Poveda and University of Asia and the Pacific. Also, modern hospital like Medical City is within easy reach. Meanwhile, Makati CBD and BGC in the south as well Filinvest City are easily accessible through the EDSA and South Luzon Express Way.

Units available:

1 Bedroom Unit - (47 sqm to 82 sqm)

2 Bedroom Unit - (96 sqm to 160 sqm)

3 Bedroom Unit - (173 sqm to 254 sqm)

GREAT VALUE IS WHAT YOU GET.

YOUR NEXT HOME IS HERE!
